original_text: I will do these things unto thee, because thou hast gone a whoring after the heathen, and because thou art polluted with their idols.
korean_text: 네가 이같이 당할 것은 네가 음란하게 이방을 따르고 그 우상들로 더럽혔기 때문이로다

sentences.original_text: I will do these things unto thee
because thou hast gone a whoring after the heathen
and because thou art polluted with their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 그들의 우상으로 더러워졌기 때문이다
